import JobZImage from "../../../../common/jobz-img"; import SectionEmployersCandidateSidebar from "../../sections/common/section-emp-can-sidebar"; import SectionShareProfile from "../../sections/common/section-share-profile"; import SectionOfficePhotos1 from "../../sections/common/section-office-photos1"; import SectionOfficeVideo1 from "../../sections/common/section-office-video1"; import SectionAvailableJobsList from "../../sections/employers/detail/section-available-jobs-list"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { loadScript } from "../../../../../globals/constants"; function EmployersDetail1Page() { const { userId } = useParams(); // Get the userId from URL parameter const [employer, setEmployer] = useState(null); // State to hold employer data const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); // Loading state useEffect(() => { // Fetch employer data from API const fetchEmployerData = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(`/employers/${userId}`); setEmployer(response.data); // Set employer data in state setLoading(false); // Set loading to false } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching employer:", error); setLoading(false); // Set loading to false even in case of error } }; fetchEmployerData(); loadScript("js/custom.js"); // Load external JS script }, [userId]); // Re-run the effect if userId changes if (loading) { return

; // Show loading text while fetching data } if (!employer) { return
